de.mrms.api
Interface Recommender

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractRecommender
public interface Recommender

Implementations of this interface can recommend items for users.

getRecommendations

java.util.List<Recommendation> getRecommendations(User user,
                                                  int howMany)
Get specified number of recommendations for the given user.
Make sure you to avoid duplicates both local and global. Local meaning in the returned list and global using DataRepository.getRatedSongIDs(String).

Parameters:
user - The user to create recommendations for
howMany - The number of recommendations to create
Returns:
List of recommendations
